metadata.title: CVE-2024-8041 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A Denial of Service (DoS) issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EEaffecting all versions prior to 17.1.6, 17.2 prior to 17.2.4, and 17.3prior to 17.3.1. A denial of service could occur upon importing amaliciously crafted repository using the GitHub importer.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
